idea:
Fitrition is a Diet and Nutrition Consultancy based company founded in the year 2018 with an aim of reducing/preventing and curing Non Communicable diseases like Diabetes type 2, Cardiovascular disease, Auto immune diseases, cancer and Chronic respiratory diseases which are putting excessive burden on our economy and increasing at a Rapid rate.

We are a fresh bunch of nutritionist, clinical nutritionist, Fitcook chef and exercise expert who are passionate and dedicated to serve our customers with the best solutions for their health problems!

idea:
FLYK is an online credit underwriting platform designed primarily for the financially underserved. For this purpose, it's building a 'Social network for credit' by emulating the working of the micro-finance institutions.


This model, can evaluate the credit worthiness of the individuals even in the absence of a CIBIL score, financial documents & transaction history data.
name: FLYK
